Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-5991 affecting package mariadb for versions less than 10.6.9-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-5991 affecting package mariadb for versions less than 10.6.9-4. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package mariadb is earlier than 10.6.9-4, affected by CVE-2024-5991
